name: Dream Quest
summary: Play cards! Kill monsters! Level Up! Dream Quest is a roguelike deckbuilding game inspired by the likes of Ascension, Magic: the Gathering, and Shandalar. Explore randomly generated levels as one of 13 classes in short, 30 minute, sessions.
info:
• 别名: 梦境任务
  • 别名: 梦境探索
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: Roguelike deck builder
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014年5月15日
  • 开发: Peter Whalen
